item.title: 5 Secrets Politicians Don't Want You to Know
item.description: How long has it been since you said, “they just don’t listen to us?” By “they,” you mean politicians, of course. Maybe you feel they listen to lobbyists and big corporations and banksters, but they don’t listen to their constituents. I have to agree with you. Politicians don’t listen to their constituents. They don’t even know who their constituents are. They know demographics and statistics about their constituents, but that’s like saying you know how a banana tastes because you read a chemical assay report of its contents.
